languages.text: "Я удивлена, что хоть кто-то понимает, что он говорит. Я перестала слушать сразу после первой фразы, и просто жду, когда Лорд-капитан что-нибудь решит".

traits.locale_text: "Я удивлена, что ты вообще понимаешь, что он говорит. Я перестала слушать сразу после первой фразы, и просто жду, когда Лорд-капитан что-нибудь решит".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."
languages.original_text: "Я удивлена, что хоть кто-то понимает, что он говорит. Я перестала слушать сразу после первой фразы, и просто жду, когда Лорд-капитан что-нибудь решит".

traits.locale_text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我真是太惊讶了，居然有人能听懂他在说什么。我光听完第一句话，就已经不想再听了。我现在只等着舰长大人做决定。”
languages.original_text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."

traits.locale_text: “我真是太惊讶了，居然有人能听懂他在说什么。我光听完第一句话，就已经不想再听了。我现在只等着舰长大人做决定。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Me sorprende que alguien pueda entender una palabra de lo que dice. Yo dejé de escuchar después de la primera frase; solo estoy esperando a que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán decida qué hacer».
languages.original_text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."

traits.locale_text: «Me sorprende que alguien pueda entender una palabra de lo que dice. Yo dejé de escuchar después de la primera frase; solo estoy esperando a que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán decida qué hacer».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「アイツの言ってることがわかること自体すごいって。あたしなんて一言目で諦めたよ。あとはロード・キャプテンに任せるわ」
languages.original_text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."

traits.locale_text: 「アイツの言ってることがわかること自体すごいって。あたしなんて一言目で諦めたよ。あとはロード・キャプテンに任せるわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Es überrascht mich, dass jemand sein Gerede tatsächlich versteht. Ich habe nach dem ersten Satz nicht mehr zugehört — jetzt warte ich nur darauf, dass der Lord Captain entscheidet, worum es auch gehen mag."
languages.original_text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."

traits.locale_text: "Es überrascht mich, dass jemand sein Gerede tatsächlich versteht. Ich habe nach dem ersten Satz nicht mehr zugehört — jetzt warte ich nur darauf, dass der Lord Captain entscheidet, worum es auch gehen mag."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis surprise de voir que quelqu'un arrive à comprendre ce qu'il raconte. J'ai arrêté d'écouter après la première phrase, j'attends juste que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} décide de la suite. »
languages.original_text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis surprise de voir que quelqu'un arrive à comprendre ce qu'il raconte. J'ai arrêté d'écouter après la première phrase, j'attends juste que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} décide de la suite. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Adamın dediklerinden bir şey anlıyorsam ne olayım. Zaten ağzından çıkan ilk lafta benim kayış koptu... Lord Kaptan herifin anlattıklarını anlasın da yapalım diye bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I'm surprised that anyone can understand a thing he says. I stopped listening after the first sentence — now I'm just waiting for the Lord Captain to decide on whatever it is."

traits.locale_text: "Adamın dediklerinden bir şey anlıyorsam ne olayım. Zaten ağzından çıkan ilk lafta benim kayış koptu... Lord Kaptan herifin anlattıklarını anlasın da yapalım diye bekliyorum."
